title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 that cover various aspects of event-centric natural language processing (NLP
container-title: including natural language understanding (NLU), event extraction, commonsense understanding, and other relevant topics

title: **"Event Extraction from Text: A Survey"** by Thien Huu Nguyen
Overview of event extraction techniques and methodologies
**"Deep Learning for Event-Driven Stock Prediction"** by Ding, Xiao, et al
Application of deep learning to event extraction for financial prediction
Multilingual Training Corpus"** by Linguistic Data Consortium
Introduction to a multilingual corpus used for event extraction tasks
**"A Survey on Event Detection Techniques in Social Multimedia"** by T
Survey on event detection in social media and multimedia content
**"Event Detection and Summarization in Social Media Streams: A Survey"** by Atefeh Farzindar and Diana Inkpen
Comprehensive survey on event detection and summarization in social media
**"Event Extraction Using Distant Supervision"** by Chen, Yubo, et al
Discusses the use of distant supervision for event extraction tasks
**"Joint Event Extraction via Recurrent Neural Networks"** by Nguyen
Introduction of RNNs for joint event extraction
**"A Survey on Event Detection from Tweets"** by Atefeh Farzindar and Diana Inkpen
Focuses on event detection methodologies specifically for Twitter data
**"Event Detection and Classification on Twitter: A Survey"** by Hasan
Survey on various techniques for detecting and classifying events on Twitter
**"Event Extraction from Newswire Articles"** by Grishman
Early work on event extraction from newswire text
**"Event Detection and Summarization: A Survey"** by Chakrabarti
Survey on event detection and summarization techniques
**"A Survey on Event Extraction Methods from Text"** by Yang
Overview of various event extraction methods from textual data
**"Commonsense Knowledge in Machine Learning: A Survey"** by Davis
Discusses the role of commonsense knowledge in machine learning and NLP
**"Event Extraction as Dependency Parsing"** by McClosky, David, et al
Approach to event extraction using dependency parsing techniques
**"Event Extraction with Structured Perceptron"** by Li, Qi, et al
Structured perceptron approach to event extraction
**"A Survey on Event Detection Techniques in Social Networks"** by R
Survey on event detection techniques in social networks
**"Event Detection and Tracking in Social Media"** by Atefeh Farzindar and Diana Inkpen
Techniques for detecting and tracking events in social media
**"Event Extraction from Biomedical Text Using a Hidden Vector State Model"** by Poon, Hoifung, and Lucy Vanderwende
Event extraction in the biomedical domain using hidden vector state models
**"Event Detection and Summarization in Social Media Streams"** by Becker, Hila, et al
Techniques for event detection and summarization in social media streams
**"Event Extraction from Clinical Reports"** by Roberts, Kirk, et al
Event extraction techniques applied to clinical reports
These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the various aspects of event-centric NLP, including foundational concepts, methodologies, and applications across different domains
